items.title: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) Expands Singapore AI Innovation With US$1B Investment And Airline Partnership
items.description: Last week, Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) announced a significant collaboration with Singapore Airlines, integrating its technologies to enhance customer service through AI solutions. Despite this positive development, the company's stock faced a decline of 3.58% over the same period. This dip aligns with broader market trends, as the market itself dropped by 3.7%, affected by ongoing economic uncertainties, including concerns about tariff impacts and potential recession risks. During this time, major...

items.title: Marc Benioff on Agentic AI and Salesforce's Next Chapter
items.description: Why Salesforce doesn't plan to hire any software engineers this year.  To catch full episodes of all The Motley Fool's free podcasts, check out our podcast center.  Should you invest $1,000 in Salesforce right now?
